responses: Hi there, how can I help?

I can help you with the following: 
1.  What is Coronavirus? 
2. What are the symptoms? 
3. How do you protect yourself?
4. Myth busters 
5. Travel Advisory 
6. Count of cases 
7. information on Hospitals & Testing centres 
8.Helpline Details

Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses found in both animals and humans. A novel coronavirus (nCoV) is a new strain of coronavirus that has not been previously identified in humans. The new, or “novel” coronavirus, now called 2019-nCoV, was detected after the first reported case in Wuhan, China in December 2019. 
 You can watch this video to know more 
 http://bit.ly/2uxLw3M

patterns: what are the symptoms for corona
what are the symptoms for covid 19
what are the symptoms for covid
responses:
COVID-19 affects different people in different ways. Most infected people will develop mild to moderate illness and recover without hospitalization. 
 Most common symptoms: 
 fever 
 dry cough 
 tiredness 
 
 Less common symptoms: 
 aches and pains 
  sore throat 
 diarrhoea 
 conjunctivitis 
 headache 
 loss of taste or smell 
 a rash on skin, or discolouration of fingers or toes 
 
 Serious symptoms: 
 difficulty breathing or shortness of breath 
 chest pain or pressure 
 loss of speech or movement 
 Seek immediate medical attention if you have serious symptoms. Always call before visiting your doctor or health facility. 
 People with mild symptoms who are otherwise healthy should manage their symptoms at home. 
 On average it takes 5–6 days from when someone is infected with the virus for symptoms to show, however it can take up to 14 days.

patterns: Tell me how to protect myself
responses:
Here are few tips to keep yourself safe from Coronavirus : 
 1. *Wash hands frequently*
 2. *Practice hygiene*
 3. *Keep safe distance*
 4. *Avoid touching eyes,nose & mouth*
 5. *Seek medical care for symptoms*
 6. *General hygiene measures*
 7. *Avoid raw or under-cooked animal products*
 8. *Wear Masks Outside.*
 9. *Follow Government guidelines strictly*
 Check out : https://covidindia.org/covid-19-prevention/
 Check the video : https://youtu.be/bPITHEiFWLc

The various state government has issued guidelines regarding the entry of people from other states to their state. 
 https://covidindia.org/travel-guidelines-for-entry-of-people-by-states/
